content: single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 round 3 *single_crochet 1 increase 1* repeat 5 times 18 round 4 *single_crochet 2 increase 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 5 *single_crochet 3 increase 1* repeat 5 times 30 round 6-10 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 round 11 *single_crochet 3 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 12 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around tbl 24 back loops only this is for the skirt round 13-15 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 finish off and leave long tail for sewing sssskkkkiiiirrrrtttt find the loops on the body where you went through the back loops there should be a fairly distinct line of front loops and that s what we re going to work with flip your bunny body upside down to work on the skirt that means open side neck down in any stitch of the front loop begin pattern round 1 1 single_crochet in each front loop around 30 round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 60 round 3 *4 single_crochet in next single_crochet sl stitch in next single_crochet* repeat 11 times finish off and secure yarn to hide it aaaarrrrmmmmssss mmmmaaaakkkkeeee 2222 ooooffff tttthhhheeeemmmm round 1 chain 2 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook 5 round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 round 3-7 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 stuff flatten the round open end and whipstitch closed will create an almost jointed look leave a long tail for sewing lllleeeeggggssss mmmmaaaakkkkeeee 2222 ooooffff tttthhhheeeemmmm round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook 6 round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 round 3 *single_crochet 1 increase 1* repeat 5 times 18 round 4 *single_crochet 2 increase 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 5 *single_crochet 1 decrease 1 tbl* 18 through back loops round 6 *single_crochet 1 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 12 round 7-10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 stuff flatten the round open end and whipstitch closed will create an almost jointed look leave a long tail for sewing eeeeaaaarrrrssss mmmmaaaakkkkeeee 2222 ooooffff tttthhhheeeemmmm round 1 chain 25 turn round 2 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and to the last stitch on that side 4 half_double_crochet in the next stitch and along every stitch on the other side of the ear you just created the round bottom part of the ear and up the other side round 3 starting back at the top of the ear 4 half_double_crochet in the next stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch until you reach the bottom again 4 half_double_crochet in the next stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch until you reach the top finish off leave a long tail for sewing there will be a little hole in the top part of the ear at this point use your long tail and sew it up a little bit to get rid of the hole you re done make sure you stuff all the parts to your liking and use one of
